trans-unit.source: Provides initialization settings for the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> XAML writer implementation.
trans-unit.target: Fornece configurações de inicialização para o <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"> </xref> implementação do gravador XAML.

trans-unit.source: The defaults for all XamlXmlWriterSettings values are `false`.
trans-unit.target: Os padrões para todos os valores de XamlXmlWriterSettings são `false`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriterSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriterSettings"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> should always assume valid XAML input for purposes of duplicate resolution or other error checking.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se o <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"> </xref> deve sempre considerar a entrada XAML válida para fins de resolução duplicada ou outra verificação de erro.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> skips certain validation or error checks, such as throwing exceptions on duplicate members.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"> </xref> ignorará determinadas verificações de validação ou erro, como lançar exceções em membros duplicados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> throws exceptions when invalid XAML is encountered.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"> </xref> lança exceções quando XAML inválido é encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> should close immediately on <xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose" name="Dispose" href=""></xref> or other operations, or whether the XAML writer should instead write the buffer output before closing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se o <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"> </xref> deve fechar imediatamente em <xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose" name="Dispose" href=""> </xref> ou outras operações, ou se o gravador XAML em vez disso, deve gravar a saída do buffer antes de fechar.

trans-unit.source: Use this setting with caution; closing immediately can result in invalid XAML that cannot be loaded again.
trans-unit.target: Use essa configuração com cuidado; fechar imediatamente pode resultar em XAML inválido que não pode ser carregado novamente.

trans-unit.source: This setting influences the logic of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, which calls `Close` on the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> or <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> when CloseOutput is `true`; or it calls <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter.Flush%2A> (again tied to the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> or <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>) if CloseOutput is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Essa configuração influencia a lógica de <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, que chama `Close` em subjacente <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>ou <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>quando CloseOutput é `true`; ou ele chama <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter.Flush%2A>(novamente ligado ao subjacente <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>ou <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>) se for CloseOutput `false`.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter.Flush%2A> </xref:System.IO.TextWriter> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> immediately closes on a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose" name="Dispose" href=""></xref> or similar operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"> </xref> fecha imediatamente em uma <xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose" name="Dispose" href=""> </xref> ou operações semelhantes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the remaining buffer output is written before the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> is released.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>Se a saída de buffer restante é gravada antes do <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"> </xref> é liberado.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriterSettings"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cópia deste <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriterSettings"> </xref> instância.
